roleset.name: keep (up)
roleset.note: MAINTAIN-V NOTES: Frames file for 'maintain' based on survey of initial sentences of big corpus and comparison with 'keep' (from maintain.01-v predicate notes)
MAINTENANCE-N NOTES: Based on sentences in nouns-00040. Comparison to maintain.01. VN class sustain-55.6. FN class activity_ongoing. Framed by Katie. (from maintenance.01-n)

example.name: transitive agentive
example.text: We-1 have a long history of *trace*-1 maintaining an open direct-investment policy.

example.name: maintained belief
example.text: Several traders maintained that the Merc's 12-point circuit-breaker aggravated the market slide Oct 13.
example.arg: that the Merc's 12-point circuit-breaker aggravated the market slide Oct 13

example.name: with benefactive
example.text: ...*trace* to maintain commercial air service for an estimated 92 communities, often in rural areas.
example.arg: for an estimated 92 communities, often in rural areas.

example.name: arg 2
example.text: to provide maintenance for other manufacturers

example.name: arg 1
example.text: the maintenance of relations between the ROC and its diplomatic partners
example.arg: of relations between the ROC and its diplomatic partners

example.name: one more arg 1
example.text: the maintenance of order during elections
